recipes.name: Pancakes with Maple Syrup & Berries

pancakes: ¾ cup milk (or buttermilk for extra fluffiness)
toppings: ½ cup fresh berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)

prepare_the_batter: In a mixing bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk the egg, milk, vanilla extract, and melted butter.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined (do not overmix).
cook_the_pancakes: Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease it with butter or oil.
Pour about ¼ cup of batter onto the pan for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface and the edges start to set (about 2 minutes).
Flip and cook the other side for another 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
assemble_and_serve: Stack the pancakes on a plate.
Top with fresh berries and a little butter if desired.

tips: Use buttermilk instead of milk for extra fluffy pancakes.
Don't overmix the batter to keep the pancakes light and airy.
Serve immediately for the best texture and taste.
recipes.enjoy_message: Enjoy your Pancakes with Maple Syrup & Berries! 🥞🍓🍯

recipes.name: Oats & Chia Pudding with Honey

pudding: 1 cup milk (or almond milk for a dairy-free option)
toppings: ¼ cup fresh berries (blueberries, raspberries, or strawberries)
1 tablespoon nuts or seeds (almonds, walnuts, or flaxseeds)

prepare_the_pudding: In a bowl or jar, mix rolled oats, chia seeds, milk, honey, and vanilla extract.
Stir well to combine, cover, and refrigerate overnight (or at least 4 hours) until thickened.
assemble_and_serve: Once the pudding has thickened, give it a good stir.
Top with banana slices, fresh berries, and nuts/seeds.
Drizzle with extra honey for sweetness.

tips: Adjust the sweetness by adding more or less honey.
Use coconut milk for a rich and creamy texture.
Can be stored in the fridge for up to 3 days.
recipes.enjoy_message: Enjoy your Oats & Chia Pudding with Honey! 🥣🍯🍌

recipes.name: Masala Omelette with Toast

prepare_the_omelette_mixture: In a bowl, whisk the eggs with salt, pepper, and red chili powder.
Add chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and cilantro. Mix well.
cook_the_omelette: Heat butter or oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and spread it evenly.
Cook for about 2 minutes until the edges start to set.
Flip the omelette and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
assemble_and_serve: Toast the bread slices and spread butter on top.
Serve the omelette with toasted bread.

tips: Add grated cheese for a richer taste.
Serve with ketchup or green chutney for extra flavor.
Use a non-stick pan to prevent sticking.
recipes.enjoy_message: Enjoy your Masala Omelette with Toast! 🍳🍞🌿

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg

prepare_the_avocado_spread: Mash the ripe avocado in a bowl.
Add lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Mix well.
poach_the_eggs: In a saucepan, bring water to a gentle simmer. Add vinegar.
Crack an egg into a small bowl, then gently slide it into the water.
Cook for 3-4 minutes until the egg whites are set but the yolk remains runny.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on a paper towel.
assemble_and_serve: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on each slice.
Place a poached egg on top.
Garnish with red pepper flakes and chopped parsley.

tips: Use fresh eggs for better poaching.
Sprinkle feta cheese or sesame seeds for extra flavor.
Serve immediately for the best taste.
recipes.enjoy_message: Enjoy your Avocado Toast with Poached Egg! 🥑🍞🥚

recipes.name: Banana & Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl

smoothie_base: ½ cup milk (or almond milk for dairy-free)

prepare_the_smoothie_base: In a blender, combine frozen bananas, milk, peanut butter, and vanilla extract.
assemble_and_serve: Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
Top with sliced banana, granola, and chia seeds.

tips: Use frozen bananas for a thick and creamy texture.
Add protein powder for an extra protein boost.
Can be made vegan by using plant-based milk.
recipes.enjoy_message: Enjoy your Banana & Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl! 🍌🥜🥣
